lines.text: What'd you say the name of your band was called?
Mondo Diarrhea.
Alien Vomit.
I have trouble swinging my butt.
You mean your bat.
Yes, my butt.
The hospital is fine except for this wicked nurse. She's got the face of a dragon's butt.

[Lifts up his leg too high causing Him to shout in pain]
Some People here do understand English, Mr. Shintaro!
Let's murdalize them!
I wanted to come to Japan, Grandpa.
Thank you for wanting to continue your Ninja training.
Ninja? I really wanted to go there to learn how to be a Sumo Wrestler. You know how much those guys get to eat everyday?
[Slam mistakes a letter opener as the dagger]
Did you hatch from a moron egg? Does that look like this?
Before you go to Japan, you will be tested on the field of battle. Remember, four strands of rope, apart you can snap, but together you can be strong, now get out there and kick butt!

[a Ninja whips out a cell phone instead of his sword]
What are you gonna do, talk us to death?

[after Tum Tum hit his face with a pie]
Mmmm, Lemon Meringue.
Banana Cream Bozo, nice try!
Don't you just hate us?

[after a home alone like battle with three dumb bad guys, when the trio was going to prepare dinner]
What happened, I thought You said You were gonna have Dinner ready, what is this mess?
These three Guys came, they wanted to rob the Place!
What could they want to rob?
VCR's and stuff, we heard them talking.
Yeah, but they finally gave up and ran away!
We did everything You taught us, we were great!
A true Ninja, never brags about His skill, next time this happens... call the Police.
I think that's him.
Who?
The old fart. The guy we're trying to steal this from.
[shows photo of dagger]
No wonder your uncle's offering twenty grand.
What are you guys, Teenage Mutant wannabes?
Not!
[swings down from tree and knocks them down]
We're the 3 Ninjas! Yah!
Let's get outta here while we're still standing.
I'm with that, brother. Out of my way, Slam, I'm outta here!

[Slam and Vinnie run]
I'm working with idiots.

[Last Lines]
I hope there's lots of food in our next adventure, see You next time!
Watch the target grow in front of your eyes. And when it gets as big as a melon, throw!
[repeated line]
Scramble!

[singing]
Where's my fish, where's my fish? It's dead I gotta get a new fish!
Hey, Uncle. How's the weather in Japan?
My idiot nephew, forget the weather. Did you get the pictures?
Uh huh, oh yeah.
[looks at pictures of dagger]
Cool knife.
One! Two! Three... three...
Four!
Four!

[Angry and spits after witnessing a fight break out during the baseball match]
This is the most disgraceful display i have ever seen in baseball history. Your supposed to be learning how to be cisterns and sport mans NOT Hooligans. I am suspending this game for one week to give you a chance to cool down. The game starts over next Sunday, that is if by then and if you decide to GROW UP.
